info.title: Voucherify API
info.description: Voucherify promotion engine REST API. Please see https://docs.voucherify.io/docs for more details.

delete.description:
Deletes a loyalty campaign and all related loyalty cards. This action cannot be undone. Also, it immediately removes any redemptions on loyalty cards.

If the `force` parameter is set to `false` or not set at all, the loyalty campaign and all related loyalty cards will be moved to [the bin](ref:list-bin-entries).

parameters.name: force
parameters.description: If this flag is set to `true`, the campaign and related vouchers will be removed permanently. If it is set to `false` or not set at all, the loyalty campaign and all related loyalty cards will be moved to the bin. Going forward, the user will be able to create the next campaign with the same name.

200.description: Returns the ID of the scheduled asynchronous action, informing you that your request has been accepted and the loyalty campaign will be deleted from the repository asynchronously. To check the deletion status and result, copy the `async_action_id` from the response and pass it using <!-- [Get Async Action](OpenAPI.json/paths/~1async-actions~1{asyncActionId}/get) -->[Get Async Action](ref:get-async-action) endpoint.

404.description: Returns an error indicating that the loyalty campaign with given ID was not found.

value.details: Cannot find campaign with id Summer Loyalty Perks

key.description: Short string describing the kind of error which occurred.

message.description: A human-readable message providing a short description of the error.

details.description: A human-readable message providing more details about the error.

request_id.description: This ID is useful when troubleshooting and/or finding the root cause of an error response by our support team.

resource_id.description: Unique resource ID that can be used in another endpoint to get more details.

error.description: Includes additional information about the error.

message.description: The message configured by the user in a validation rule.

AsyncActions.description: Response to requests that are processed asynchronously.

async_action_id.description: The ID of the scheduled asynchronous action.
